text: Steinar Amundsen (4 July 1945 - 16 June 2022) was a Norwegian sprint canoeist. He won a world title in 1970 and 1975. He also won an Olympic gold medal in 1968. He also won a bronze medal at the 1972 Games. Amundsen was born in Bærum, Norway. Amundsen died on 16 June 2022 in Røyken, Norway at the age of 76.Steinar Amundsen ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Norway Category:Olympic gold medalists for Norway Category:Canoeists
title: Steinar Amundsen
